text: I have been a long time client . Went overseas for some time and now that Iâ€™m back in Singapore, reconnected again.  The standard of client care and professionalism is commendable and continues to impress.  Staff are assuring, friendly and approachable.

If there were 6 stars I would have rated this place 6. These were the best doctors in the world. I would especially want to thank Dr. Sam for his endless concern. He was very kind and because of my back injury I could not bend down and tie my shoelaces and without  any hesitation he tied my shoelaces. I would want to say that all the doctors should be kind to the patients like Dr. Sam

Totally not a bot or a customer being forced to write a 5 star review. But I can confidently say I have enjoyed my physio sessions and sport massages. My boi John does a great job at making sure I dont completely massacre my severely abused body 10/10 would recommend, John. Staff are really friendly and nice. The services are not as suspect as the name suggests

I'm so thankful I decided to visit Natural Healings. Dr Sam has helped me so much with my back and neck aches. As a graphic designer, I spent hours on working on the desk, in front of my computer and this gives me strains easily. I would recommend everyone to give Natural Healings a visit!
Quite a good chiropractic place... my back pain have good improvement over the past 1 year..
